title: Any role, if you're high Silver or Gold and decent, add me.
body:
Just need one more reliable teammate on my team. Can carry 3 anchors as mid or top, not 4.

Preferably support who knows importance of warding, ward control, upgrades to red trinket upon buying sightstone, upgrades red trinket on level 9, correct item builds, can counter-pick, et cetera.

replies.body:
Top main, mostly play GP but can also confidently play Poppy, Trundle, Maokai, Malphite and if you count this, Garen lul. Best at decisive shot calling and winning lane. Previously been apart of a low platium team. I'm on Discord, Skype etc. 


p.s I will be getting a name change soon @.@
I am a support main, do everything listed above. I currently am silver 4, climbing pretty quickly.
